posting_body: ['Apartment Rental Experts', '2 Bedroom and 1 Bath in Somerville / Ball Square $2,750', 'Somerville / Ball Square / Davis Square', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#144844', 'Apartment Summary', '2 bedroom on the 3rd floor of a 3-Family with hardwood floors throughout, eat-in kitchen with dishwasher and free laundry in the basement.', 'There is also a shared yard.', 'Walk to Davis Square in about 8 minutes.', '(Reference #144844)', 'Apartment Details', 'Location:', 'Somerville/Ball Square', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bath:', '1', 'Reference:', '#144844', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Call the office @ 617-684-8000', 'Email : Hit Reply top left', 'Contact Information', 'Call:', '617.684.8000', 'Please mention reference #', '144844', '* Availability, fee and monthly rent are subject to change.', ' Please call to verify details.', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
